title: Ebro In The Morning - Gang Violence, Hip-Hop, and Social Media + Drake Unfollows Rihanna
itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
itunes:summary:
Ebro, Rosenberg and Laura Stylez star in HOT97's flagship program Ebro in the Morning - this episode aired on 2/3/2022.

Ebro, Rosenberg, Laura Stylez, and the crew are in the studio talking about the new Kanye documentary and the drama surrounding it, as well as the Brian Flores NFL Racism case. Ebro keeps it real talking about gang violence, social media, and hip-hop. All that and more on Ebro In The Morning! 

Click here to learn about the Hot 97 - Securing the Future initiative. 

Please like and subscribe to Ebro In The Morning.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
